Package JSci.physics

Interface Summary
PhysicalConstants A collection of fundamental physical constants.
 

Class Summary
AbstractClassicalParticle  
ClassicalParticle The ClassicalParticle class provides an object for encapsulating classical point particles.
ClassicalParticle2D The ClassicalParticle2D class provides an object for encapsulating classical point particles that live in 2D.
ClassicalParticle3D The ClassicalParticle3D class provides an object for encapsulating classical point particles that live in 3D.
ConstantForce2D The ConstantForce2D class provides an object for encapsulating constant forces in 2D.
ConstantForce3D The ConstantForce3D class provides an object for encapsulating constant forces in 3D.
ConstantTorque3D The ConstantTorque3D class provides an object for encapsulating constant torques in 3D.
Drag The drag force is proportional to the square of a particle's speed.
Force A superclass for forces.
Force2D The Force2D class provides an object for encapsulating forces in 2D.
Force3D The Force3D class provides an object for encapsulating forces in 3D.
GravityField  
Particle A superclass for building objects that have the physical nature of a particle.
RelativisticParticle The RelativisticParticle class provides an object for encapsulating relativistic particles.
RigidBody2D The RigidBody2D class provides an object for encapsulating rigid bodies that live in 2D.
RigidBody3D The RigidBody3D class provides an object for encapsulating rigid bodies that live in 3D.
Spring  
Torque3D The Torque3D class provides an object for encapsulating torques in 3D.
